00078 static void CreateFileWithHeader
00079 (
00080         const string &execId,
00081         const string &celFile,
00082         const string &outFile,
00083         const vector<string>& extraColNames,
00084         const vector<string>& extraColTypes,
00085         int numEntries,
00086         int maxProbeSetNameLength,
00087         const string &algName,
00088         const string &algVersion,
00089         const string &chipType,
00090         const string &programName,
00091         const string &programVersion,
00092         const string &programCompany,
00093         const vector<string>& paramNames,
00094         const vector<string>& paramValues,
00095         const vector<string>& sumNames,
00096         const vector<string>& sumValues,
00097         const vector<string>& extraNames,
00098         const vector<string>& extraValues
00099 )
00100 {
00101         // Create the vector of extra columns. The sample code here supports only float, 32 bit integers and 8 bit unsigned integers.
00102         vector<ColumnInfo> extraColumns;
00103         int ncols = (int)extraColNames.size();
00104         for (int icol=0; icol<ncols; icol++)
00105         {
00106                 if (extraColTypes[icol] == "float")
00107                 {
00108                         FloatColumn fcol(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(extraColNames[icol]));
00109                         extraColumns.push_back(fcol);
00110                 }
00111                 else if (extraColTypes[icol] == "int")
00112                 {
00113                         IntColumn intcol(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(extraColNames[icol]));
00114                         extraColumns.push_back(intcol);
00115                 }
00116                 else if (extraColTypes[icol] == "ubyte")
00117                 {
00118                         UByteColumn ubcol(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(extraColNames[icol]));
00119                         extraColumns.push_back(ubcol);
00120                 }
00121                 else
00122                 {
00123                         throw string("Unsupported column type: ") + extraColTypes[icol];
00124                 }
00125         }
00126 
00127         // Create the data object
00128         CHPMultiDataData *data = new CHPMultiDataData(outFile);
00129     data->SetEntryCount(GenotypeMultiDataType, numEntries, maxProbeSetNameLength, extraColumns);
00130         data->SetAlgName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(algName));
00131         data->SetAlgVersion(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(algVersion));
00132         data->SetArrayType(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(chipType));
00133 
00134         // Store the CEL header
00135         if (celFile.length() > 0 && FileUtils::Exists(celFile.c_str()) == true)
00136         {
00137                 FusionCELData cel;
00138                 cel.SetFileName(celFile.c_str());
00139         cel.ReadHeader();
00140             GenericData *gdata = cel.GetGenericData();
00141             if (gdata != NULL)
00142                         data->GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(*gdata->Header().GetGenericDataHdr()); 
00143             cel.Close();
00144         }
00145 
00146         // Add algorithm parameters to list.
00147     ParameterNameValueTypeList params;
00148     ParameterNameValueType param;
00149     
00150         if (programName.empty() == false)
00151         {
00152                 param.SetName(L"program-name");
00153                 param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(programName));
00154                 data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00155         }
00156 
00157         if (programVersion.empty() == false)
00158         {
00159                 param.SetName(L"program-version");
00160                 param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(programVersion));
00161                 data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00162         }
00163 
00164         if (programCompany.empty() == false)
00165         {
00166                 param.SetName(L"program-company");
00167                 param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(programCompany));
00168                 data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00169         }
00170 
00171         int nparams = (int) extraNames.size();
00172         for(int iparam=0; iparam<nparams; iparam++)
00173         {
00174                 param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(extraNames[iparam]));
00175         param.SetValueAscii(extraValues[iparam]);
00176         data->GetGenericData().Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(param);
00177         }
00178 
00179         nparams = (int) paramNames.size();
00180         param.SetName(L"exec-guid");
00181         param.SetValueAscii(execId);
00182         params.push_back(param);
00183         for(int iparam=0; iparam<nparams; iparam++)
00184         {
00185                 param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(paramNames[iparam]));
00186         param.SetValueAscii(paramValues[iparam]);
00187         params.push_back(param);
00188         }
00189         if (params.empty() == false)
00190                 data->AddAlgParams(params);
00191 
00192         params.clear();
00193         nparams = (int) sumNames.size();
00194         for(int iparam=0; iparam<nparams; iparam++)
00195         {
00196                 param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(sumNames[iparam]));
00197         param.SetValueAscii(sumValues[iparam]);
00198         params.push_back(param);
00199         }
00200         if (params.empty() == false)
00201                 data->AddSummaryParams(params);
00202 
00203         // Creating the writer object will create the file with the header information.
00204         CHPMultiDataFileWriter writer(*data);
00205 }

00211 static int CallToCode(const string &call)
00212 {
00213         if (isdigit(call[0]) != 0)
00214         {
00215                 return atoi(call.c_str());
00216         }
00217         else
00218         {
00219                 if (call == "AA" || call == "aa")
00220                         return SNP_AA_CALL;
00221                 else if (call == "AB" || call == "ab")
00222                         return SNP_AB_CALL;
00223                 else if (call == "BB" || call == "bb")
00224                         return SNP_BB_CALL;
00225                 else
00226                         return SNP_NO_CALL;
00227         }
00228 }
00229 
00237 static void AddFileBody(const string &outFile, int maxProbeSetNameLength, const list<list<string>> &data, const vector<string>& extraColTypes)
00238 {
00239         // Create the buffer writer object
00240         CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter genotypeEntryBufferWriter;
00241         vector<string> fileNames;
00242         fileNames.push_back(outFile);
00243     vector<MultiDataType> dataTypes;
00244     dataTypes.push_back(GenotypeMultiDataType);
00245     map<MultiDataType, int> maxLen;
00246     maxLen[GenotypeMultiDataType] = maxProbeSetNameLength;
00247         genotypeEntryBufferWriter.Initialize(&fileNames, dataTypes, maxLen);
00248 
00249         // Write the data
00250         ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData entry;
00251         for (list<list<string>>::const_iterator rowIt=data.begin(); rowIt!=data.end(); rowIt++)
00252         {
00253                 list<string>::const_iterator colIt=rowIt->begin();
00254                 entry.name = *colIt;
00255                 ++colIt;
00256                 entry.call = CallToCode(*colIt);
00257                 ++colIt;
00258                 entry.confidence = (float)atof(colIt->c_str());
00259                 ++colIt;
00260 
00261                 entry.metrics.resize(rowIt->size() - 3);
00262                 int colIdx = 0;
00263                 for (; colIt!=rowIt->end(); colIt++, colIdx++)
00264                 {
00265                         if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "float")
00266                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueFloat((float)atof(colIt->c_str()));
00267                         else if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "int")
00268                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueInt32(atoi(colIt->c_str()));
00269                         else if (extraColTypes[colIdx] == "ubyte")
00270                                 entry.metrics[colIdx].SetValueUInt8(CallToCode(colIt->c_str()));
00271                 }
00272                 genotypeEntryBufferWriter.WriteMultiDataGenotypeEntry(GenotypeMultiDataType, 0, entry);
00273         }
00274 
00275         // Flush the buffer. The destructor will close the file.
00276         genotypeEntryBufferWriter.FlushBuffer();
00277 }
00278 
00283 static list<string> ParseLine(char *line)
00284 {
00285         list<string> tokens;
00286         const char *sep = "\t";
00287         char *token = strtok(line, sep);
00288         while (token != NULL)
00289         {
00290                 tokens.push_back(token);
00291                 token = strtok(NULL, sep);
00292         }
00293         return tokens;  
00294 }
00295 
00301 static void ReadData(const string &inFile, list<list<string>> &data, int &maxProbeSetNameLength)
00302 {
00303         // Open the file
00304         ifstream instr(inFile.c_str(), ios::in);
00305         if (!instr)
00306                 throw string("Unable to read the input file");
00307 
00308         // First line with header
00309         char line[1024];
00310         instr.getline(line, 1024);
00311 
00312         // Get the data
00313         maxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00314         data.clear();
00315         while (instr.getline(line, 1024))
00316         {
00317                 list<string> cols = ParseLine(line);
00318                 data.push_back(cols);
00319                 maxProbeSetNameLength = max(maxProbeSetNameLength, (int) cols.begin()->size());
00320         }
00321 }
00322 
00324 static void show_help()
00325 {
00326         const char *tab = "\t";
00327         cout << "The command line arguments include" << endl;
00328         cout << tab << "-execid <the execution id>" << endl;
00329         cout << tab << "-cel <the name of the parent cel file>" << endl;
00330         cout << tab << "-in <the name of the input data file, TSV with 1 header row>" << endl;
00331         cout << tab << "-out <the name of the output CHP file>" << endl;
00332         cout << tab << "-arrayType <the probe array type>" << endl;
00333         cout << tab << "-algName <the algorithm name>" << endl;
00334         cout << tab << "-algVersion <the algorithm version>" << endl;
00335         cout << tab << "-programName <the program name>" << endl;
00336         cout << tab << "-programVersion <the program version>" << endl;
00337         cout << tab << "-programCompany <the name of the company>" << endl;
00338         cout << tab << "-colNames <a list of column names in the input file, not including" << endl;
00339         cout << tab << "                   the probe set name, call and confidence>" << endl;
00340         cout << tab << "-colTypes <a list of column types, either \"float\" or \"int\" or \"ubyte\">" << endl;
00341         cout << tab << "-paramNames <a list of parameter names>" << endl;
00342         cout << tab << "-paramValues <a list of parameter values>" << endl;
00343         cout << tab << "-sumNames <a list of summary parameter names>" << endl;
00344         cout << tab << "-sumValues <a list of summary parameter values>" << endl;
00345         cout << tab << "-extraNames <a list of extra parameter names>" << endl;
00346         cout << tab << "-extraValues <a list of extra parameter values>" << endl;
00347         cout << endl;
00348         cout << "The input file must have the probe set name, call (AA, AB, BB, No Call)" << endl <<
00349                         "and confidence as the first three columns. All other columns must be of" << endl <<
00350                         "either floating point of integer type. Use the colTypes to specify the" << endl <<
00351                         "type. The paramNames and paramValues arguments are used to specify" << endl <<
00352                         "algorithm parameter." << endl;
00353 }

00356 int main(int argc, char * argv[])
00357 {
00358         try
00359         {
00360                 // Parse the command line arguments.
00361                 CCmdLine cmdLine;
00362                 if (cmdLine.SplitLine(argc, argv) < 1)
00363                 {
00364                         show_help();
00365                         exit(-1);
00366                 }
00367 
00368                 string execId = cmdLine.GetArgument("-execid", 0);
00369                 string celFile = cmdLine.GetSafeArgument("-cel", 0, "");
00370                 string inFile = cmdLine.GetArgument("-in", 0);
00371                 string outFile = cmdLine.GetArgument("-out", 0);
00372                 string arrayType = cmdLine.GetArgument("-arrayType", 0);
00373                 string algName = cmdLine.GetArgument("-algName", 0);
00374                 string algVersion = cmdLine.GetArgument("-algVersion", 0);
00375                 string programName = cmdLine.GetArgument("-programName", 0);
00376                 string programVersion = cmdLine.GetArgument("-programVersion", 0);
00377                 string programCompany = cmdLine.GetArgument("-programCompany", 0);
00378 
00379                 vector<string> colNames;
00380                 int n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-colNames");
00381                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00382                         colNames.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-colNames", i));
00383 
00384                 vector<string> colTypes;
00385                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-colTypes");
00386                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00387                         colTypes.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-colTypes", i));
00388 
00389                 vector<string> paramNames;
00390                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-paramNames");
00391                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00392                         paramNames.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-paramNames", i));
00393 
00394                 vector<string> paramValues;
00395                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-paramValues");
00396                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00397                         paramValues.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-paramValues", i));
00398 
00399                 vector<string> sumNames;
00400                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-sumNames");
00401                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00402                         sumNames.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-sumNames", i));
00403 
00404                 vector<string> sumValues;
00405                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-sumValues");
00406                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00407                         sumValues.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-sumValues", i));
00408 
00409                 vector<string> extraNames;
00410                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-extraNames");
00411                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00412                         extraNames.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-extraNames", i));
00413 
00414                 vector<string> extraValues;
00415                 n = cmdLine.GetArgumentCount("-extraValues");
00416                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00417                         extraValues.push_back(cmdLine.GetArgument("-extraValues", i));
00418 
00419                 // Read the TSV input file
00420                 int maxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00421                 list<list<string>> data;
00422                 ReadData(inFile, data, maxProbeSetNameLength);
00423 
00424                 // Create the CHP file.
00425                 CreateFileWithHeader(execId, celFile, outFile, colNames, colTypes, (int) data.size(), maxProbeSetNameLength,
00426                         algName, algVersion, arrayType, programName, programVersion, programCompany, paramNames, paramValues,
00427                         sumNames, sumValues, extraNames, extraValues);
00428                 AddFileBody(outFile, maxProbeSetNameLength, data, colTypes);
00429         }
00430         catch (string s)
00431         {
00432                 cout << s << endl;
00433                 show_help();
00434         }
00435         catch (int e)
00436         {
00437                 cout << "Invalid argument" << endl;
00438                 show_help();
00439         }
00440         catch (...)
00441         {
00442                 cout << "Unknown error" << endl;
00443                 show_help();
00444         }
00445         return 0;
00446 }
